entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the afternoon. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Wind becoming west 30 before morning. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
